name: roister
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to enjoy yourself in a noisy and energetic way: In his youth Lord Dorset had roistered with Lord Rochester at the court of Charles II. Crowds of people roistered along, chattering and sometimes cheering.
More examplesFewer examplesHe drew the murals while roistering in Ithaca with a painter pal.Should you spot a hen-party roistering around your way anytime soon, chances are it's heading towards this movie.Legend has it that during certain summer full moons the wild elephants arrive to roister amongst the ruins.
